title: Crypto stocks help pull Wall Street lower and threaten its 5-day winning streak
description: U.S. stocks are giving back some of last week’s rally, as bitcoin, Nvidia and other former stars of Wall Street fall again.

title: Bitcoin dips below $85,000 in crypto currency rout

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum fall sharply as crypto sell-off resumes

title: Bitcoin Slides More Than 5% As Crypto Selloff Resumes
description: Bitcoin briefly dropped below $86,000 early on Monday, reversing the recovery it mounted last week following its worst month since the 2021 crypto crash.

title: Southeast Asia grows wary of crypto mining
description: As illegal crypto mining and scams proliferate across Southeast Asia, governments are discovering that "cheap" power for bitcoin can mean billion-dollar losses, strained power grids and rising climate costs.

title: Bitcoin : quand la crypto met l’Afrique face à un dilemme énergétique
description: Les avantages potentiels en termes de revenus et d’infrastructure numérique du boom du minage de bitcoin sont rapidement compromis par les demandes des mineurs pour une électricité à prix bas.
